<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_111077</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_111077</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A black hole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine schwarze Bohrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un trou noir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um furo preto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un foro nero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια μαύρη τρύπα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un calabozo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates a distorted space occupied by a black hole (top) and the distance from the centre of the black hole to the surface of the sphere or event horizon (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">black holes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distortion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">event horizon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Schwarzschild radius</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Space</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spheres</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht einen verzerrten 
Platz, der durch eine schwarze Bohrung (Oberseite) besetzt wird und 
den Abstand von der Mitte der schwarzen Bohrung zur Oberfläche des 
Bereich- oder Fallhorizontes (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre un espace tordu occupé par 
un trou noir (dessus) et la distance du centre du trou noir sur la 
surface de l'horizon de sphère ou d'événement (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra um espaço distorcido 
ocupado por um furo preto (alto) e pela distância do centro do furo 
preto à superfície do horizonte da esfera ou do evento (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra uno spazio storto occupato
da un foro nero (parte superiore) e dalla distanza dal centro del foro
nero alla superficie dell'orizzonte di evento o della sfera (parte 
inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί έναν διαστρεβλωμένο χώρο 
που καταλαμβάνεται από μια μαύρη τρύπα (κορυφή) και την απόσταση
από το κέντρο της μαύρης τρύπας στην επιφάνεια της σφαίρας ή 
του ορίζοντα γεγονότος (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra un espacio torcido ocupado 
por un calabozo (tapa) y la distancia del centro del calabozo a la 
superficie del horizonte de la esfera o del acontecimiento (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schwarze Bohrungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verzerrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fallhorizont</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwarzschild Radius</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Platz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayon de Schwarzschild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
